Title: An Egg-centric Discovery
Description:
Have you seen the new eggs this year? Well, you could say they are quite egg-citing!

... Well, I'll get to the point. These new eggs that we've discovered will appear and vanish within minutes! That sounds quite egg-straordinary, right?

Let me know when you're ready and we'll see to it that those eggs appear, but be quick! They'll be gone before you know it.

I'll trade you a more permanent egg when you return with vanishing eggs.
ObjectivesText: Talk to a Spring Gatherer in Razor Hill, Brill, Bloodhoof Village, or Falconwing Square.
